copyError-msg: There was an error. Please, copy the code manually.
defaultDescription-msg: We will add a small description about this EUC soon.
noWheel-msg: We don't have this EUC in our database.
newModels-msg: This website only shows the newest and most powerful versions of each EUC provided by the manufacturer.
olderVersions-msg: That means, older and/or less powerful versions (even if they are sold nowadays) won't be shown in this website.
displayedSpeed-msg: All EUCs mentioned in this website are sold with a limited top speed of {{ speed }}.
modifySpeed-msg: In order to reach speeds mentioned in this website some custom modifications for that wheel are needed.
displayedRange-msg: Displayed range in this website is based in a more realistic EUCs usage.
usageExamples-msg: This includes hard accelerations, hard breaking, go up ramps, jumping or keeping hight speeds during prolonged periods of time.
information-msg: about models, speed and ranges displayed.
disclaimer1-msg: This website is not related nor depends on any of the stores that can be shown.
disclaimer2-msg: However, some of the links shown can be sponsored by some of these stores.
noWheels-msg: There are no EUCs that match your search criterias.
changeFilters-msg: Relax or reset the filters to find some options that is close to what you are looking for.
confirmation-msg: This means {{appName}} is not responsible for anything you do in {{externalName}}'s site.
manualDiscount-msg: If you want to get a {{discount}}% discount, you need to manually enter this code when you are proccesing your payment:
name: Name
